#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	long long int t, n, m, i, j, count;
	scanf("%lld", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		count = 0;
		scanf("%lld%lld", &n, &m);
		long long int arr[n+2][m+2];
		for(i=1; i<=n; i++)
		{
			arr[i][m+1] = 2147483647;
			for(j=1; j<=m; j++)
			{
				scanf("%lld", &arr[i][j]);
				arr[n+1][j] = 2147483647;
			}
		}
		
		i = 1; j = 1;
		
		while(arr[i][j] != 2147483647)
		{	
			if(arr[i+1][j] < arr[i][j+1])
				i++;
			else
				j++;
			
			count++;
		}
		
		printf("%lld\n", count-1);
	}
	return 0;
}
